Description.Text: HOVIMA Jardin Caleta is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation and high quality facilities within easy reach of La Enramada beach. The hotel is situated in the peaceful village of La Caleta, within easy reach of La Enramada beach. Guests are also within driving distance of Playa de Fanabe beach and promenade, which offers a great selection of shops and restaurants. For those seeking a lively nightlife, Playa de las Americas boasts an excellent selection of bars and clubs. Other places of interest include Playa del Bobo, Puerto Colon, Playa de Torviscas and Siam Park. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a tan facade. Facilities include three outdoor swimming pools, tennis courts and a Jacuzzi. There is also a reading room, TV room, children's playground and activities club. The hotel provides organised activities, sports and live entertainment daily. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available in public areas. The restaurant offers buffet style Spanish and European dishes. The pool bar and the sports bar offer a wide range of alcoholic and soft beverages. 1-Bedroom Apartments have a bright modern decor. They comprise a bedroom, lounge, kitchenette with a microwave, hob and a fridge, and a furnished balcony or terrace with pool views. Amenities include a satellite/cable TV, telephone and chargeable safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby. Free water, wine and fruit are provided daily.
